name: Liquid Generator
explanation: Liquids for resource tables. Subtables have been sorted from common to rare. See also: material.json, metal.json. Author: Esko Vesala. Sources: Wikipedia.org.

tables.name: liquid
tables.explanation: Subtables present liquids known in different types of genres and worlds. The first subtables are compatible with the largest number of  worlds, and  get more specialized towards the end. Modern and scifi subtables are not called by default to retain compatibility with the default fantasy setting. Some subtables intentionally overlap.

tables.name: mythic
tables.explanation: Imaginary liquids once rumoured to have existed.

tables.name: scifi
tables.explanation: Imaginary liquids for science fiction worlds.
